title: Foundational Collaborative Programming Workshop for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to strengthen collaborative competencies in developing simple math education programs.

learning_goals: Learners improve communication efficiency by 80% or more through role rotation (driver/navigator) in pair programming
Learners correct logical errors occurring during collaborative work with a partner at least three times using collaborative problem-solving strategies

Learners complete a math modeling project through ≥3 iterative feedback cycles (e.g., daily scrums) within a goal-oriented collaboration process (e.g., Kanban board), submitting a report meeting ≥4 of 5 peer-evaluation rubric items (≥80%).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
